text: Saint-Antonin-de-Lacalm is a former commune. It is in Occitanie in the Tarn department in south France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Terre-de-Bancalié.Arrêté préfectoral 29 November 2018 == References == Category:Former communes in Tarn
title: Saint-Antonin-de-Lacalm
